name: Nature Escapes 4
description:
Nature Escapes 4 will take you on an enchanting adventure in this captivating hidden object game!



Indulge in the untamed beauty of nature in captivating locations across the world, while you grace your garden with a mesmerizing assortment of unique plants and exotic flowers!

Features

  • 24 chapters of nature fun!
  • Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
  • Fun facts about fun plants!
  • Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
  • Decorate your very own garden!

Collector's Edition

  • includes 6 extra locations
  • 12 minigames
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Music player
  • Additional plants and flowers
  • Explore the developer's own plant children

Seach for hidden objects, play fun mini-games, and unleash your creativity as you transform your garden into a blooming paradise of plants and flowers!
